contentrichtext.text: {{Orphan|date=January 2012}} {{Refimprove|date=June 2007}} {{distinguish|Pussay}} The small village of '''Pussy''' ({{IPA-fr|pysi}}) is in the [[commune in France|commune]] of [[La Léchère]] in the [[Savoie]] ''[[département in France|département]]'' of [[France]], not far from [[Moûtiers, Savoie|Moûtiers]]. {{Reference necessary|).|date=February 2013}} {{Reference necessary|text=The name derives from the [[Gallo-Roman]] name ''Pusiacum'', from ''pusus'' meaning ''little boy''.|date=April 2010}} Lying near the [[river Isère]] and the mountain of Mont Bellachat, the village boundary covers 18 km² (6.8 mile²). The local [[Church (building)|church]], dedicated to [[Saint John the Baptist]], was rebuilt in 1669. In 1561 the population was recorded as 1455 people, 548 in 1776, and 276 in 1979. Pussy and several other small villages were merged into the La Léchère commune for administrative purposes in 1972.<ref>[http://www.insee.fr/fr/nom_def_met/nomenclatures/cog/affichecommune.asp?numdep=73&valcode=209 ''Code officiel géographique''], [[INSEE]]. {{fr icon}}</ref> ==See also== {{Refbegin|2}} {{Refend}} == References == {{Reflist|2}} == External links == * {{fr icon}} [http://www.la-lechere.com/ La Léchère tourist office] {{Coord|45|31|00|N|6|28|27|E|region:FR_type:city(150)|display=title}} [[Category:Former communes of Savoie]] [[Category:Hameaux in Savoie]] {{Savoie-geo-stub}}
